entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:26 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:26 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023
